title: Constructivist-Based Expert Collaboration Education Using Online Discussion Boards

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and domain-specific expertise (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Recreates actual job situations in simulation/VR environments and conducts linked learning with discussion boards

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose solutions for social issues arising in VR simulations with over 80% participation on discussion boards.
Learners conduct collaborative knowledge-building activities with peer experts at least three times using constructivist-based interaction strategies.
Learners achieve 90% proficiency in writing feedback that reflects critical thinking and interdisciplinary connections on discussion boards.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
